text: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ

translation.en: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten
translation.id: Dia (Allah) berfirman, "Demikianlah, dahulu telah datang kepadamu ayat-ayat Kami, dan kamu mengabaikannya, jadi begitu (pula) pada hari ini kamu diabaikan
